metadata.Description: Approaches and initiatives that are driven and implemented by local communities to address sustainable energy challenges and meet their specific needs.

entities.Description: Markets where electricity, natural gas, and other energy commodities are bought and sold.
Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions implement sustainable energy projects that aim to provide clean and affordable energy to local communities.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions provide funding for renewable energy initiatives to support the transition to sustainable energy sources.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions focus on improving energy access in underserved areas by promoting the use of sustainable energy technologies.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions partner with local governments to collaborate on sustainable energy projects and initiatives.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions contribute to climate change mitigation by promoting the adoption of sustainable energy practices and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

relations.Description: Community-led solutions monitor energy consumption to identify opportunities for energy efficiency improvements and sustainable energy use.

relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets employ renewable energy technologies to diversify the energy mix and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.
